name: Save the planet
description:
This image represents the sustainability of life on the planet. The surrender of the planet from a mother to her child.
The image is the result of an experience applied to an orange, which is squeezed, excavated, simulating the processes of exploitation of planet earth and then the attempt to repair it. The message it gives is that the planet will never be the same, our children and grandchildren have the same right to enjoy our wonderful planet.
